statements: DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 101 AND progress_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE performance_score < 70 AND attendance_status = 'Absent';
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 123 AND assessment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE date < '2022-06-01' AND attendance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Absent';
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Absent';
DELETE FROM Performance WHERE test_score < 70 AND test_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Progress WHERE progress_date < '2021-06-30' AND progress_description LIKE '%incomplete%';
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 1 AND attendance_date = '2022-01-05';
